attributes.action: Provide free bus travel for under-22s in England
attributes.additional_details: We urge the Government to provide free bus travel for under-22s in England. Scotland’s National Entitlement Card has shown that free youth travel increases mobility, reduces emissions, and improves access to education, work, and wellbeing. This change would support equality, sustainability, and young people’s independence.
attributes.background: Scotland and Wales already offer free or discounted bus travel for young people. We believe England should do the same to support equal access to transport, reduce emissions, and improve opportunities for young people.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Fund free bus travel and increase rail fare discounts for those 22 and under
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/730337
